original: @86a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //üîΩtshe 'phel bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
analyzed: @86a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo // tshe 'phel bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
translated: Homage to glorious VajravidƒÅra·πáa.

original: gnas khang yid dang mthun par dpa' bo gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs te /
analyzed: gnas khang yid dang mthun par dpa' bo gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs te /
translated: A practitioner who possesses the commitments and who wishes to increase lifespan should erect the ma·πá·∏çala of the sole hero in a pleasing place.

original: bum pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i nang du chang la sogs pa'i chang rigs sna tshogs blugs la de'i nang du zas dpag tu med pa dang / bum pa'i snying po rnams blugs la lha'i mtshan ma gdab /üîΩtshe bshos zla gam la bu ram la sogs pa'i ro mchog sna tshogs pas brgyan la /üîΩtshon sna lnga'i skud pas gzungs thag gdags /üîΩmda' bya rgod ma la dar le brgan gyi 'phur lce btags la skabs su g-yab /
analyzed: bum pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i nang du chang la sogs pa'i chang rigs sna tshogs blugs la de'i nang du zas dpag tu med pa dang / bum pa'i snying po rnams blugs la lha'i mtshan ma gdab / tshe bshos zla gam la bu ram la sogs pa'i ro mchog sna tshogs pas brgyan la / tshon sna lnga'i skud pas gzungs thag gdags / mda' bya rgod ma la dar le brgan gyi 'phur lce btags la skabs su g-yab /
translated: Having poured various types of beer, such as chang, into a vase that possesses the characteristics, place an immeasurable amount of food and the essence of the vase inside.üîΩPlace the arrow of a vulture with a streamer of red silk on top of the vase, and wave it from time to time.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' mar rtsva d'ur pa'i gcal dgram /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' mar rtsva d'ur pa'i gcal dgram /
translated: Lay out a checkered pattern of durva grass around the ma·πá·∏çala.

original: bkra shis tshe 'phel gyi rdzas zho dang / bil ba dang / li khri la sogs pa rnams kyang bzhag / de nas mchod pa'i bye brag ji ltar 'byor pa dang / bar chad bsal ba'i don du gtor ma bzang po yang gzhag go //
analyzed: bkra shis tshe 'phel gyi rdzas zho dang / bil ba dang / li khri la sogs pa rnams kyang bzhag / de nas mchod pa'i bye brag ji ltar 'byor pa dang / bar chad bsal ba'i don du gtor ma bzang po yang gzhag go //
translated: Then set out whatever special offerings you have and also an excellent bali for dispelling obstacles.

original: de nas rdo rje rnam 'joms sku mdog dkar por bsgyur te spyan drang ba dang / ye shes sems dpa' bstim pa dang / mchod pa dang bstod pa bya /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje rnam 'joms sku mdog dkar por bsgyur te spyan drang ba dang / ye shes sems dpa' bstim pa dang / mchod pa dang bstod pa bya /
translated: Next, transform VajravidƒÅra·πáa into white color, invite him, absorb the awareness being, and offer praise.

original: de nas bum pa dang padma'i snying po 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du lha mo brgyad sku mdog dang / phyag mtshan gsal bar bskyed la /
analyzed: de nas bum pa dang padma'i snying po 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du lha mo brgyad sku mdog dang / phyag mtshan gsal bar bskyed la /
translated: Then, on the heart of the vase and the eight-petaled lotus, generate the eight goddesses clearly with their colors and hand implements.

original: tshe'i bdag po brgyad po'i sngags brgya phrag re bzlas la /
analyzed: tshe'i bdag po brgyad po'i sngags brgya phrag re bzlas la /
translated: Recite the mantras of the eight lords of life one hundred times each.

original: de nas bstod pa ni /
analyzed: de nas bstod pa ni /

analyzed: phyag na tshe 'phel ro hi ta //

analyzed: tshe dang dpal gyi las mdzad ma /
translated: She performs the activity of life and glory.

analyzed: byang shar phyogs kyi tshe khugs la //
translated: In the northeast, the life-force of life,

original: rnal 'byor bdag gi tshe spel cig / aom buddha aom bhr'um /
analyzed: rnal 'byor bdag gi tshe spel cig / aom buddha aom bhr'um /
translated: Om buddho 'm bhurum

original: h'um badzra h'um bhr'um /
analyzed: h'um badzra h'um bhr'um /
translated: Hum vajra hum bhurum

original: sv'a ratna sv'a bhr'um /
analyzed: sv'a ratna sv'a bhr'um /
translated: Sva ratna sva bhurumüîΩA padma a bhurum

original: a'a: padma a'a: bhr'um /
analyzed: a'a: padma a'a: bhr'um /
translated: Ha karma ha bhurum

original: h'a karma h'a bhr'um zhes ye shes tshe rgyun bdag dang sems can thams cad la rgyas par dmigs la /
analyzed: h'a karma h'a bhr'um zhes ye shes tshe rgyun bdag dang sems can thams cad la rgyas par dmigs la /
translated: Visualize that the stream of awareness-life is extended to oneself and all sentient beings.

original: snying po bsdus pa la bzlas pa bya /
analyzed: snying po bsdus pa la bzlas pa bya /
translated: Recite the condensed essence mantra.

original: rgyud stong phrag lnga @87a * //
analyzed: rgyud stong phrag lnga @87a * //
translated: Recite the tantra five thousand times.

original: bzlas ; gos dkar po dri ma med pa gon la /
analyzed: bzlas ; gos dkar po dri ma med pa gon la /
translated: Wear a clean white garment.

original: gzhan la byed na dbang /
analyzed: gzhan la byed na dbang /
translated: If one is performing for another, it is empowerment.

original: rang la byed na lus thams cad rang bzhin gyi rdo rje chen po gcig tu byin gyis brlabs la /
analyzed: rang la byed na lus thams cad rang bzhin gyi rdo rje chen po gcig tu byin gyis brlabs la /
translated: If one is performing for oneself, bless the entire body as a single great natural vajra.

original: kha zas rtag tu ra mnye ba dang / 'o ma bsten /
analyzed: kha zas rtag tu ra mnye ba dang / 'o ma bsten /
translated: Always eat curd and drink milk.

original: 'bras bu gsum la sman mar rtag par gtong ngo //
analyzed: 'bras bu gsum la sman mar rtag par gtong ngo //
translated: Always take medicinal butter of the three fruits.

original: kha zas lhag ma tshe bshos 'ba' zhig dang / tshe skyems la zas skom bya'o //
analyzed: kha zas lhag ma tshe bshos 'ba' zhig dang / tshe skyems la zas skom bya'o //
translated: The remaining food is only life-supporting food and drink.

original: nyin mtshan du rgyud rdzogs par kha ton bya'o //
analyzed: nyin mtshan du rgyud rdzogs par kha ton bya'o //
translated: Day and night, recite the complete tantra.

original: rtag tu rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa yid la bya /
analyzed: rtag tu rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa yid la bya /
translated: Always keep in mind the Vajra-destroying-all-evil.

original: tshe 'phel ba'i don du dge 'dun la ston mo bya zhing bram ze rnams la yon dbul /
analyzed: tshe 'phel ba'i don du dge 'dun la ston mo bya zhing bram ze rnams la yon dbul /
translated: For the sake of increasing life, make offerings to the Sangha and give gifts to the Brahmans.

original: rtag tu tshe'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs /
analyzed: rtag tu tshe'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs /
translated: Always set up the mandala of life.

original: mchod pa dang bstod pa dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sdig pa bshags pa dang / 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / smon lam gdab pa rnams bya'o //
analyzed: mchod pa dang bstod pa dang / sems bskyed pa dang / sdig pa bshags pa dang / 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / smon lam gdab pa rnams bya'o //
translated: Make offerings, praise, generate the Thought of Enlightenment, confess sins, pray for the fulfillment of your desires, rejoice in the good deeds of others, and make vows.

original: dkon mchog la skyabs su 'gro ba la brtson par bya'o //
analyzed: dkon mchog la skyabs su 'gro ba la brtson par bya'o //
translated: Strive to go for refuge to the Three Jewels.

original: rtag tu khrus bya zhing gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: rtag tu khrus bya zhing gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya'o //
translated: Always bathe and wear clean clothes.

original: de ltar rgyun du byas na rnal 'byor pa de'i lus kyi skogs pa rim pa bdun brje ba dang / skra dkar dang gnyer ma med pa dang / so dang sen mo brje ba la sogs pa'i rtags dang yon tan mang po 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar rgyun du byas na rnal 'byor pa de'i lus kyi skogs pa rim pa bdun brje ba dang / skra dkar dang gnyer ma med pa dang / so dang sen mo brje ba la sogs pa'i rtags dang yon tan mang po 'byung ba yin no //
translated: If you do this continuously, many signs and good qualities will appear to the yogin, such as the seven layers of skin on his body being replaced, his hair and wrinkles disappearing, his teeth and nails being replaced, and so forth.

original: lus gzhon zhing snum bag dang ldan par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: lus gzhon zhing snum bag dang ldan par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: The body becomes youthful and has a smooth complexion.

original: de'i tshe yang sgrub pa po rab kyis nyi zla ji srid gnas kyi ring la thub po //
analyzed: de'i tshe yang sgrub pa po rab kyis nyi zla ji srid gnas kyi ring la thub po //
translated: At that time, the best practitioner lives as long as the sun and moon endure.

original: 'bring gis 'bum phrag rtsa gnyis su thub par nges so //
analyzed: 'bring gis 'bum phrag rtsa gnyis su thub par nges so //
translated: The middling one certainly lives for two hundred thousand years.

original: tha mas stong phrag bco brgyad thub par nges so //
analyzed: tha mas stong phrag bco brgyad thub par nges so //
translated: The least one certainly lives for eighteen thousand years.

original: skabs su yi ge brgya pa 'bum phrag re bzlas shing gshegs so //
analyzed: skabs su yi ge brgya pa 'bum phrag re bzlas shing gshegs so //
translated: From time to time, recite the hundred-syllable mantra one hundred thousand times and request forbearance.

original: bla ma la yon dbul /
analyzed: bla ma la yon dbul /
translated: Offer gifts to the guru.

original: dgos pa'i bya ba ma yin pa gang yang mi bya /
analyzed: dgos pa'i bya ba ma yin pa gang yang mi bya /
translated: Do not do anything that is not necessary.

original: de ltar byas na tshe 'phel bar nges so //
analyzed: de ltar byas na tshe 'phel bar nges so //
translated: If you do it this way, it is certain that your life will increase.

original: tshe 'phel ba'i sgrub thabs rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo zhes bya ba /
analyzed: tshe 'phel ba'i sgrub thabs rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo zhes bya ba /
translated: The method of increasing life called ‚ÄúThe Pinnacle of the Banner‚Äù

original: slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: is complete.
